TopicTitle: Can we expect Duna (and other Planets) to look as good as this in a future release?

Articles.Content:
http://www.jpl.nasa.gov/video/index.cfm?id=840

would be cool to walk around in a landscape like in this video by NASA

cheers

That would be really nice! I don't know if it'd be hard on low-end computers, but Duna is known for its Redness, mars is a rustic iron color(Orange).

Hopefully one day squad would add those. If not, Oh well Duna still looks good.
